entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:31 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
